properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 4 at 9:14AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Buttahatchie River and Tombigbee River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen
* from Thursday, February 6 until further notice.
* At 8 AM Tuesday the stage was...8.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 13.8 feet on Friday, February 7.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Thursday, February 6, and
continue to rise to near 13.8 feet by Friday, February 7.
* At 14.0 feet...Flood water begins to cover Airbase Road located on
the west bank of the river. Low-lying farm land near the river also
begins to flood.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
